note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

CPC-specific-text.text: for medical purposes, for biological purposes
for computing periodic phenomena, e.g. fertility periods
for air navigation or sea navigation
for gun laying, for bomb aiming
for conversion from one unit system to another, e.g. from British to metric

title-part.text: Devices in which computing is effected by adding, subtracting, or comparing lengths of parallel or concentric graduated scales
with rectilinear scales, e.g. slide rule
in which a straight or curved line has to be drawn from given points on one or more input scales to one or more points on a result scale
in which a straight or curved line has to be drawn through related points on one or more families of curves
Devices in which the computing operation is performed mechanically
for performing additions or subtractions, e.g. differential gearing
for performing multiplications or divisions, e.g. variable-ratio gearing
for evaluating functions by using cams and cam followers
for integrating or differentiating, e.g. by wheel and disc
for simulating specific processes, systems, or devices
Devices in which the computing operation is performed by means of fluid-pressure elements
Devices in which the computing operation is performed by varying electric or magnetic quantities
Details not covered by G06G7/04 - G06G7/10,

reference.text: graph readers G06K11/00; function plotters, co-ordinate plotters G06K15/22,

title-part.text: Programming arrangements, e.g. plugboard for interconnecting functional units of the computer
Arrangements for performing computing operations, e.g. operational amplifiers

CPC-specific-text.text: adapted for telemeasuring or for indicating or recording the results of the measurement G01D1/10, G01D1/16; for fuzzy computing G06N7/02

title-part.text: for optimisation, e.g. least square fitting, linear programming, critical path analysis, gradient method

CPC-specific-text.text: computing the average by addition; differential amplifiers H03F3/45

reference.text: G06G7/19 and G06G7/24 take precedence; measuring electric power G01R21/00

title-part.text: with pulse modulation, e.g. modulation of amplitude, width, frequency, phase or form
using galvano- magnetic effects, e.g. Hall effect
using a variable impedance controlled by one of the input signals, variable amplification or transfer function
using means for evaluating powers, e.g. quarter square multiplier

CPC-specific-text.text: with respect to a variable other than time

title-part.text: using an operational amplifier comprising a capacitor or a resistor in the feedback loop
for forming integrals of products, e.g. Fourier integrals, Laplace integrals, correlation integrals
for analysis or synthesis of functions using orthogonal functions

reference.text: Fourier or spectrum analysis G01R23/16; sound analysis or synthesis G10L

CPC-specific-text.text: using a magnetic medium, a linear filter
for forming Fourier integrals, harmonic analysis and synthesis
for forming correlation integrals; for forming convolution integrals

reference.text: G06G7/195, G06G7/1907 and G06G7/1914 take precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: by converting at least one the input signals into a two level signal, e.g. polarity correlators
for forming other integrals of product, e.g. orthogonal functions, Laplace, Laguerre, Walsh, Hadamard, Hilbert

reference.text: G06G7/195, G06G7/1907 and G06G7/1914 take precedence

title-part.text: for evaluating powers, roots, polynomes, mean square values, standard deviation

reference.text: G06G7/122, G06G7/28 take precedence; gamma correction in television systems H04N5/20, H04N9/69
trigonometric computations using simultaneous equations G06G7/34

CPC-specific-text.text: for computations in the complex plane; G06G7/20, G06G7/28 take precedence

title-part.text: for evaluating logarithmic or exponential functions, e.g. hyperbolic functions

reference.text: for multiplication, division or for evaluating powers or roots using logarithmic functions; gamma correction in television systems H04N5/20, H04N9/69

title-part.text: for discontinuous functions, e.g. backlash, dead zone, limiting absolute value or peak value

reference.text: measuring the maximum value of currents or voltages G01R19/30
using Fourier series or other orthogonal functions G06G7/19; using curve followers G06K11/02

title-part.text: for synthesising functions by piecewise approximation
of single equations of quadratic or higher degree
using discontinuous medium, e.g. resistance network
Analogue computers for specific processes, systems or devices, e.g. simulators

CPC-specific-text.text: for determining the trajectory of particles, e.g. of electrons

reference.text: measurement performed on radiation beams G01T1/29; processing or analysing tracks of particles G01T5/02

title-part.text: for distribution networks, e.g. for fluids
for nuclear physics, e.g. nuclear reactors, radioactive fall

reference.text: processing of scintigraphic or other radio-isotope data G01T1/1647, G01T1/2992

CPC-specific-text.text: for physico-chemical processes; for metallurgical processes

title-part.text: for living beings, e.g. their nervous systems

CPC-specific-text.text: ; for problems in the medical field

note.note-paragraph: This group covers only computers specially adapted for electronic systems or devices

reference.text: measuring characteristics of electric networks, e.g. plotting Nyquist diagram G01R27/28

title-part.text: for power apparatus, e.g. motors, or supply distribution networks

reference.text: for control systems of electric power apparatus G06G7/66

title-part.text: for determining the most economical distribution in power systems
for civil engineering structures, e.g. beam, strut, girder,
for vehicles, e.g. to determine permissible loading of ships
for component analysis, e.g. of mixtures, of colours
for direction-finding, locating, distance or velocity measuring, or navigation systems
Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass
